extDesc.message: bitwarden is a secure and free password manager for all of your devices.

loginOrCreateNewAccount.message: Log in or create a new account to access your secure vault.
loginOrCreateNewAccount.description: Log in or create a new account to access your secure vault.

masterPassDesc.message: The master password is the password you use to access your vault. It is very important that you do not forget your master password. There is no way to recover the password in the event that you forget it.
masterPassDesc.description: The master password is the password you use to access your vault. It is very important that you do not forget your master password. There is no way to recover the password in the event that you forget it.

masterPassHintDesc.message: A master password hint can help you remember your password if you forget it.
masterPassHintDesc.description: A master password hint can help you remember your password if you forget it.

autoFillInfo.message: There are no logins available to auto-fill for the current browser tab.
autoFillInfo.description: There are no logins available to auto-fill for the current browser tab.

enterEmailToGetHint.message: Enter your account email address to receive your master password hint.
enterEmailToGetHint.description: Enter your account email address to receive your master password hint.

noFolders.message: There are no folders to list.
noFolders.description: There are no folders to list.

emailUsDirectly.message: Email us directly to get help or leave feedback.
emailUsDirectly.description: Email us directly to get help or leave feedback.

visitOurWebsiteDirectly.message: Visit our website to get help, news, email us, and/or learn more about how to use bitwarden.
visitOurWebsiteDirectly.description: Visit our website to get help, news, email us, and/or learn more about how to use bitwarden.

gitHubIssue.message: Open an issue at our GitHub repository.
gitHubIssue.description: Open an issue at our GitHub repository.

passGenInfo.message: Automatically generate strong, unique passwords for your logins.
passGenInfo.description: Automatically generate strong, unique passwords for your logins.

bitWebVaultInfo.message: Manage your logins from any web browser with the bitwarden web vault.
bitWebVaultInfo.description: Manage your logins from any web browser with the bitwarden web vault.

bitIosVaultInfo.message: Manage your logins from your mobile devices with the bitwarden iOS vault.
bitIosVaultInfo.description: Manage your logins from your mobile devices with the bitwarden iOS vault.

bitAndrVaultInfo.message: Manage your logins from your mobile devices with the bitwarden Android vault.
bitAndrVaultInfo.description: Manage your logins from your mobile devices with the bitwarden Android vault.

importLoginsInfo.message: Quickly bulk import your logins from other password management applications.
importLoginsInfo.description: Quickly bulk import your logins from other password management applications.

noLoginsInList.message: There are no logins to list.
noLoginsInList.description: There are no logins to list.

rateExtensionDesc.message: Please consider helping us out with a good review!
rateExtensionDesc.description: Please consider helping us out with a good review!

browserNotSupportClipboard.message: Your web browser does not support easy clipboard copying. Copy it manually instead.
browserNotSupportClipboard.description: Your web browser does not support easy clipboard copying. Copy it manually instead.

masterPassLength.message: Master password must be at least 8 characters long.
masterPassLength.description: Master password must be at least 8 characters long.

masterPassDoesntMatch.message: Master password confirmation does not match.
masterPassDoesntMatch.description: Master password confirmation does not match.

newAccountCreated.message: Your new account has been created! You may now log in.
newAccountCreated.description: Your new account has been created! You may now log in.

masterPassSent.message: We've sent you an email with your master password hint.
masterPassSent.description: We've sent you an email with your master password hint.

valueCopied.description: ' copied'. This is part of a sentence so be sure to leave the space prefix. For example: 'Password copied'

autofillError.message: Unable to auto-fill the selected login on this page. Copy/paste your username and/or password instead.
autofillError.description: Unable to auto-fill the selected login on this page. Copy/paste your username and/or password instead.

logOutConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to log out?
logOutConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to log out?

changeMasterPasswordConfirmation.message: You can change your master password on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?
changeMasterPasswordConfirmation.description: You can change your master password on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?

changeEmailConfirmation.message: You can change your email address on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?
changeEmailConfirmation.description: You can change your email address on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?

twoStepLoginConfirmation.message: Two-step login makes your account more secure by requiring you to enter a security code from an authenticator app whenever you log in. Two-step login can be enabled on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?
twoStepLoginConfirmation.description: Two-step login makes your account more secure by requiring you to verify your login with another device such as a security key, authenticator app, SMS, phone call, or email. Two-step login can be enabled on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?

loggingOutConfirmation.message: You've recently updated from an older version. You must re-log in to change your lock options. Do you want to log out now?
loggingOutConfirmation.description: You've recently updated from an older version. You must re-log in to change your lock options. Do you want to log out now?

deleteFolderConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete this folder?
deleteFolderConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to delete this folder?

gettingStartedTutorialVideo.message: Watch our getting started tutorial to learn how to get the most out of the browser extension.
gettingStartedTutorialVideo.description: Watch our getting started tutorial to learn how to get the most out of the browser extension.

importLoginsConfirmation.message: You can bulk import logins from the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?
importLoginsConfirmation.description: You can bulk import logins from the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?

deleteLoginConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete this login?
deleteLoginConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to delete this login?

overwritePasswordConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to overwrite the current password?
overwritePasswordConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to overwrite the current password?

credits.description: Credits (giving thanks to people that helped, like at the end of a movie)

noneFolder.description: No Folder - this is the folder for uncategorized logins

gaDesc.message: We use analytics to better learn how the extension is being used so that we can make it better. All data collection is completely anonymous.
gaDesc.description: We use analytics to better learn how the extension is being used so that we can make it better. All data collection is completely anonymous.

addLoginNotificationDesc.message: The "Add Login Notification" automatically prompts you to save new logins to your vault whenever you log into them for the first time.
addLoginNotificationDesc.description: The "Add Login Notification" automatically prompts you to save new logins to your vault whenever you log into them for the first time.

notificationAddDesc.message: Should bitwarden remember this password for you?
notificationAddDesc.description: Should bitwarden remember this password for you?

disableContextMenuItemDesc.message: Context menu options provide quick access to password generation and logins for the website in your current tab.
disableContextMenuItemDesc.description: Context menu options provide quick access to password generation and logins for the website in your current tab.

warning.description: WARNING (should stay in capitalized letters if the language permits)

exportWarning.message: This export contains your unencrypted data in .csv format. You should not store or send it over unsecure channels (such as email). Delete it immediately after your are done using it.
exportWarning.description: This export contains your unencrypted data in .csv format. You should not store or send it over unsecure channels (such as email). Delete it immediately after your are done using it.

exportMasterPassword.message: Enter your master password to export your vault data.
exportMasterPassword.description: Enter your master password to export your vault data.

exportVaultInfo.message: Export your vault data in .csv format so that you can easily modify it or move it elsewhere.
exportVaultInfo.description: Export your vault data in .csv format so that you can easily modify it or move it elsewhere.

shareVaultInfo.message: Create an organization to securely share your logins with other users.
shareVaultInfo.description: Create an organization to securely share your logins with other users.

deleteAttachmentConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete this attachment?
deleteAttachmentConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to delete this attachment?

updateKey.message: You cannot use this feature until you update your encryption key.
updateKey.description: You cannot use this feature until you update your encryption key.

premiumManageAlert.message: You can manage your membership on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?
premiumManageAlert.description: You can manage your membership on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?

premiumNotCurrentMember.message: You are not currently a premium member.
premiumNotCurrentMember.description: You are not currently a premium member.

premiumSignUpAndGet.message: Sign up for a premium membership and get:
premiumSignUpAndGet.description: Sign up for a premium membership and get:

ppremiumSignUpTwoStep.message: Additional two-step login options such as YubiKey, FIDO U2F, and Duo.
ppremiumSignUpTwoStep.description: Additional two-step login options such as YubiKey, FIDO U2F, and Duo.

ppremiumSignUpTotp.message: TOTP verification code (2FA) generator for logins in your vault.
ppremiumSignUpTotp.description: TOTP verification code (2FA) generator for logins in your vault.

ppremiumSignUpFuture.message: All future premium features. More coming soon!
ppremiumSignUpFuture.description: All future premium features. More coming soon!

premiumPurchaseAlert.message: You can purchase premium membership on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?
premiumPurchaseAlert.description: You can purchase premium membership on the bitwarden.com web vault. Do you want to visit the website now?

disableAutoTotpCopyDesc.message: If your login has an authenticator key attached to it, the TOTP verification code is automatically copied to your clipboard whenever you auto-fill the login.
disableAutoTotpCopyDesc.description: If your login has an authenticator key attached to it, the TOTP verification code is automatically copied to your clipboard whenever you auto-fill the login.

premiumRequiredDesc.message: A premium membership is required to use this feature.
premiumRequiredDesc.description: A premium membership is required to use this feature.
